body:
I just updated the proposal, check it out! https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/384

- Rel https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/issues/374#issuecomment-691662459: https://github.com/meowsbits/ECIPs/blob/ecbp/mess-2/_specs/ecip-1100.md#general. Added more of a core principals section, hopefully tackling the call for establishing that as an important thing.
- Rel https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/issues/374#issuecomment-694156719, https://github.com/meowsbits/ECIPs/blob/ecbp/mess-2/_specs/ecip-1100.md#proposed-additional-subjective-arbitration. Updates spec (and code) to use the polynomial function with `big.Int`s.  
- Rel https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/issues/374#issuecomment-694526936, https://github.com/meowsbits/ECIPs/blob/ecbp/mess-2/_specs/ecip-1100.md#implementation. Updates implementation and referenced spec using a `30*13second` head staleness check to address the exploit detailed in the comment.
- Rel https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/issues/374#issuecomment-695895813 and https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/issues/374#issuecomment-696861041: https://github.com/meowsbits/ECIPs/blob/ecbp/mess-2/_specs/ecip-1100.md#the-case-and-place-of-subjectivity. Added a section about subjectivity for the hardcore code-is-law folks.
